item.title: umami
item.description:
Recently, I saw on a blog (this one) a page view counter. Having seen these on webpages for over 30 years now, I was struck that I had no idea how they worked. So like any other curiosity, I started searching around.

The first thought I had was that this was some sort of script that went and fetched a value from a database on page load, and either did an increment then, or afterwards. Probably afterwards, so as to keep the webpage snappy.
